name: Super Warrior: Dragon Legend
description:
In a different magical land, the world is thrown into chaos due to powerful enemies. Our super warrior，It's time to rebuild the world order! Come and join the adventure，start the exciting battle!

Super Warrior: Dragon Legend is an epic IDLE RPG game.  Come and build your strongest team

FEATURES

- IDLE Auto-Battle, easy to get generous rewards

- Simple operation, friendly User Interface

- Interesting and Cool Skill Effects (especially, the transform to super saiyan effect)

- Abundant plot, a huge number of familiar characters
